attributes.action: immediately acknowledge the plight of the palestinian's in Gaza and to do as much as is humanly possible to get food, clothing, medication and diesel to those who desperately need it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cutting off of Gaza is meant to 'control Hamas'. However, for those men, women and children living in Gaza who do not support Hamas, they are being punished for something they do not support. If those in Gaza who are not getting the supplies they need begin to die of starvation or disease, then those who are responsible for this must be punished.
